trans-unit.source: Installing an earlier release of Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: Installing an earlier release of Visual Studio

trans-unit.source: We update Visual Studio often so that you get the most current, optimized features.
trans-unit.target: We update Visual Studio often so that you get the most current, optimized features.

trans-unit.source: Sometimes this may include changes which alter your development environment.
trans-unit.target: Sometimes this may include changes which alter your development environment.

trans-unit.source: If you need to go back to the previous release, follow the procedure described here to first uninstall your current installation and then revert your Visual Studio state.
trans-unit.target: If you need to go back to the previous release, follow the procedure described here to first uninstall your current installation and then revert your Visual Studio state.
